bill.summary:
Abraham Lincoln Medal for Public Sacrifice Act of 2017
This bill establishes the Abraham Lincoln Medal for Public Sacrifice. The medal is awarded to officers or employees of the federal government, other than members of the Armed Forces, who are wounded or killed while acting in their official capacity.
